title: Chromebooks get a new $40 wireless keyboard and mouse combo from CTL w/ ‘Everything’ button
content:
If a Chromebook or Chromebox is your daily machine, you’ve got a new official keyboard and mouse combo option available for pre-order now with a native layout, certification from Google, and more. Here’s what you need to know about CTL’s new wireless keyboard combo for Chrome OS.

more…

The post Chromebooks get a new $40 wireless keyboard and mouse combo from CTL w/ ‘Everything’ button appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: You can get a dedicated wireless keyboard combo with a wireless mouse that's designed to work great with a Chromebook for under $50 from CTL.
